== Training BOF ==

During UDS Boston members of the Ubuntu Training Community, Canonical Training, and interested developers shall gather and discuss training related matters.

=== Agenda ===

Please add your initials behind your suggestions for the BOFs agenda.

* Lessons learned from the Ubuntu Desktop Course development [TS]
* Community involvement in training [BS] 
* Games for teaching Ubuntu courses [TS]
* Infrastructure required for running Ubuntu Desktop Courses [AP]
** Space, network, computers, desks etc
